formulas.name: AddProductActionCheck
formulas.expression: OR( ISBLANK({!Access_Type}), ISBLANK({!Quantity}), ISBLANK({!Entry_Date}), AND(ISBLANK({!End_Date}), {!Access_Type}= 'Periodic'), ISBLANK({!FilteredProductTable.firstSelectedRow.Id}) , ISBLANK({!Price}) )

formulas.name: QueryContractSummary
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Product_Name__c, ServiceDate, EndDate, Quantity, Contract__c, Access_Type__c, Approval_Status__c, Attendancy_Status__c, " & "Change_Action_Effective_End_Date__c, Change_Action_Type__c, Contract_Status__c, Description, End_Date_Time__c, ListPrice, Location__c, " & "Number_of_desks__c, Opportunity__c, Order_Product_Origin__c, OrderId, OrderItemNumber, PricebookEntryId, Product_Type__c, " & "Product2Id, Start_Date_Time__c, Status__c, Status_Order_Item__c, Temporary__c, TotalPrice, UnitPrice " & "FROM OrderItem " & "WHERE Product2.Sub_Type__c IN ('IP/VLAN', 'Restoration Fee', 'Other- (all other fee)', 'Maintenance', 'Credits(Meeting rooms windows)') AND Contract__c = '" & {!recordId.Id} & "' AND Change_Action_Type__c != 'Removed' " & "AND Change_Action_Type__c != 'Cahnged' AND Approval_Status__c = 'Activated' AND Product_Name__c != '1+" & {!AddProductAction.Results.Flow__InterviewGuid} & {!UpdateProductsAction.Results.Flow__InterviewGuid}& {!RemoveProductsAction.Results.Flow__InterviewGuid}& "'"

formulas.name: QueryFiteredProductList
formulas.expression: "SELECT Id, Name, Product2Id, Capacity_Desks__c, Size_m__c, UnitPrice, Floor__c, Window__c, Minimum_Price__c, Destination_Price__c , Last_Price__c " & "FROM PricebookEntry " & "WHERE Product2.Sub_Type__c IN ('IP/VLAN', 'Restoration Fee', 'Other- (all other fee)', 'Maintenance', 'Credits(Meeting rooms windows)') " & "AND Product2.Location__c = '" & {!recordId.Location__c} & "'"

actions.label: Contract - Add Remove Change Products - SubFlow

actions.label: Contract - Add Remove Change Products - SubFlow

fields.fieldText: Add New Products 🏢

validationRule.errorMessage: 🚫 Value must fall within the contract's defined period.
